entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
